StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetRetrainAtachment]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
( @RetrainAtachmentID uniqueiden..er ) AS
SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED
SELECT [RetrainAtachmentID], [RetrainID], [RetrainAtachmentType], [FileName], [Data] FROM [dbo].[RetrainAtachment] WHERE [RetrainAtachmentID] = @RetrainAtachmentID
